00027         void Entity::loadData(TiXmlElement *element)
00028         {
00029             PropertyMap::loadData(element);
00030 
00031             /* Get id. */
00032             if(element->Attribute("id"))
00033                 setId(element->Attribute("id"));
00034 
00035             /* Load basic data. */
00036             Vector2D position = getPosition();
00037             Vector2D::fromXML(element->FirstChildElement("position"),
00038                     &position);
00039             setPosition(position);
00040 
00041             Vector2D velocity = getVelocity();
00042             Vector2D::fromXML(element->FirstChildElement("velocity"),
00043                     &velocity);
00044             setVelocity(velocity);
00045 
00046             Vector2D::fromXML(element->FirstChildElement("radius"), &radius);
00047 
00048             queryBoolAttribute(element, "collisionchecker", &collisionChecker);
00049 
00050             float speed = getSpeed();;
00051             element->QueryFloatAttribute("speed", &speed);
00052             setSpeed(speed);
00053 
00054             /* Load controller. */
00055             TiXmlElement *controllerElement =
00056                     element->FirstChildElement("controller");
00057             if(controllerElement) {
00058                 string type = controllerElement->Attribute("type");
00059                                 controller = getControllerInstance(type, controllerElement);
00060                                 if (controller == 0) 
00061                                         LogManager::getInstance()->error("No such controller: %s", type.c_str());
00062             }
00063 
00064             /* Load positioner. */
00065             TiXmlElement *positionerElement =
00066                     element->FirstChildElement("positioner");
00067             if(positionerElement) {
00068                 string type = positionerElement->Attribute("type");
00069                                 positioner = getPositionerInstance(type, positionerElement);
00070                                 if (positioner == 0) 
00071                                         LogManager::getInstance()->error("No such positioner: %s", type.c_str());
00072             }
00073 
00074             /* Load sprite. */
00075             TiXmlElement *spriteElement = element->FirstChildElement("sprite");
00076             sprite = spriteElement ? new Sprite(spriteElement) : sprite;
00077 
00078             /* Load script. */
00079             script = element->Attribute("script") ?
00080                     element->Attribute("script") : script;
00081         }

00083         Entity::Entity(const std::string &id, bool collisionChecker,
00084                 Level *level)
00085         {
00086                     this->id = id;
00087             this->level = level;
00088             position = Vector2D(0.0f, 0.0f);
00089             velocity = Vector2D(0.0f, 0.0f);
00090             speed = 0.3f;
00091             radius = Vector2D(0.0f, 0.0f);
00092             this->collisionChecker = collisionChecker;
00093             falling = true;
00094             slipping = false;
00095             controller = 0;
00096             positioner = 0;
00097             sprite = 0;
00098             facingRight = true;
00099             timer = 0.0f;
00100         }

00102         Entity::Entity(TiXmlElement *element, Level *level)
00103         {
00104                         this->id = "none";
00105             this->level = level;
00106             position = Vector2D(0.0f, 0.0f);
00107             velocity = Vector2D(0.0f, 0.0f);
00108             speed = 0.3f;
00109             collisionChecker = false;
00110             falling = true;
00111             slipping = false;
00112             controller = 0;
00113             positioner = 0;
00114             sprite = 0;
00115             load(element);
00116             facingRight = true;
00117             timer = 0.0f;
00118         }

00148                 Controller *Entity::getControllerInstance(
00149                         const std::string& type, TiXmlElement *controllerElement) 
00150                 {
00151                         if (type == "inputcontroller") 
00152                                 return new InputController(this, controllerElement);
00153                         else 
00154                                 return NULL;
00155                 }

00157                 CollisionResponsePositioner *Entity::getPositionerInstance(
00158                                         const std::string &type, TiXmlElement *positionerElement)
00159                 {
00160                         if(type=="collisionresponsepositioner")
00161                                 return new CollisionResponsePositioner(this, positionerElement);
00162                         else 
00163                                 return NULL;

00313         BoundingBox *Entity::getBoundingBox()
00314         {
00315             boundingBox = BoundingBox(getPosition() - radius,
00316                     getPosition() + radius);
00317             return &boundingBox;
00318         }
00319 
00320         void Entity::update(float ms)
00321         {
00322             if(controller)
00323                 controller->affect(ms);
00324             if(positioner)
00325                 positioner->affect(ms);
00326 
00327             if(timer > 0.0f) {
00328                 if(timer - ms <= 0.0f)
00329                     EntityEventManager::getInstance()->timer(this);
00330                 timer -= ms;
00331             }
00332 
00333             if(getVelocity().getX() <= -0.1f * getSpeed() && facingRight)
00334                 facingRight = false;
00335             if(getVelocity().getX() >= 0.1f * getSpeed() && !facingRight)
00336                 facingRight = true;
00337 
00338             if(sprite) {
00339                 if(falling || slipping)
00340                     sprite->setAnimation("falling");
00341                 else if(getVelocity().getLength() >= 0.2f * getSpeed())
00342                     sprite->setAnimation("walking");
00343                 else
00344                     sprite->setAnimation("standing");
00345 
00346                 sprite->update(ms);
00347             }
00348 
00349             /* Check for collision. */
00350             if(collisionChecker) {
00351                 BoundingBox *myBoundingBox = getBoundingBox();
00352                 for(int i = 0; i < getLevel()->getNumberOfEntities(); i++) {
00353                     Entity *other = getLevel()->getEntity(i);
00354                     if(this != other) {
00355                         /* Collision found. */
00356                         if(myBoundingBox->intersectsWith(
00357                                 other->getBoundingBox(), getVelocity() * ms,
00358                                 other->getVelocity() * ms)) {
00359                             EntityEventManager::getInstance()->collision(this,
00360                                     other);
00361                         }
00362                     }
00363                 }
00364             }
00365         }
00366 
00367         void Entity::render()
00368         {
00369             if(sprite) {
00370                 VideoManager *videoManager = VideoManager::getInstance();
00371 
00372                 videoManager->push();
00373                 videoManager->translate(getPosition());
00374 
00375                 if(!facingRight)
00376                     videoManager->scale(Vector2D(-1.0f, 1.0f));
00377 
00378                 videoManager->translate(-radius);
00379 
00380                 sprite->render();
00381 
00382                 videoManager->pop();
00383             }
00384         }

00399         void Entity::setGarbage()
00400         {
